summary: An internal email from November 18, 2019, regarding an upcoming Washington Post report that charges are expected to be announced against two Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) guards for making false entries related to the time of Jeffrey Epstein's suicide. The sender notes the reporter's awareness and that they declined to comment.

events.title: Expected Announcement of Charges Against MCC Guards
events.description: The Washington Post is going to report that charges are expected to be announced against two MCC guards for false entries at the time of Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.

keyFacts: The Washington Post was preparing to report that charges were expected to be announced against two Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) guards.
The charges relate to false entries made at the time of Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
The internal email, dated November 18, 2019, indicates the reporter believed they were not the only one aware of this information.
The sender of the email declined to comment on the matter.
